title: Essential Politics: It's wait-and-see time for Trump's travel ban
text: Director of the advocacy group Transportation California Will Kempton said he is "frustrated and disappointed" that California has failed for decades to agree on a plan to pay for a $136-billion backlog of repairs to state highways and local roads. Gov. Jerry Brown and legislative leaders said they will take another crack at a deal during the next two months.
summary:
Director of the advocacy group Transportation California Will Kempton said he is "frustrated and disappointed" that California has failed for decades to agree on a plan to pay for a $136-billion backlog of repairs to state highways and local roads.
Jerry Brown and legislative leaders said they will take another crack at a deal during the next two months.
